Topic.Title: Looking for ThePixy's Zombie Game Source Code

Posts.EditableText: Hello all. Does anyone know where I can find the source code to thePixy's zombie game?
Posts.HTML: Hello all. Does anyone know where I can find the source code to thePixy's zombie game?

Posts.EditableText: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/zombie-apocalypse-1.html is the only one I knowof; there's a link to part 2 at the bottom of the page.
